書名: 臺灣閩南語朗讀文章選輯

段: 俗語人咧講：「勤儉較有底」，又閣講：「勤儉有補所」。阮這代的一世人就是按呢共這兩句話當做金言玉語咧奉行。毋閣做人的阿媽以後，煞感覺這兩句話愛改做「勤儉食隔暝菜」、「勤儉比狗較毋值」。

Siok8-gi2 lang5 leh kong2: “Khin5-khiam7 khah u7-te2”, iu7-koh kong2: “Khin5-khiam7 u7 pou2-sou2”. Goan2 chit tai7--e5 chit8-si3-lang5 to7 si7 an2-ne ka7 chit nng7 ku3 oe7 tong3-cho3 kim-gian5 giok8-gi2 leh hong7-heng5. M7-koh cho3-lang5 e5 a-ma2 i2-au7, soah kam2-kak chit nng7 ku3 oe7 ai3 kai2-cho3 “khin5-khiam7 chiah8 keh-me5-chhai3”, “khin5-khiam7 pi2 kau2 khah m7-tat8”.
論真，阮新婦猶算有孝啦，毋閣kan-tann有一步袂可取得，就是傷過頭討債。譬諭講，媠衫一領一領直直買，才穿一兩擺，就提去救濟，講啥乜舊衫嫌鎮塊，送予別人較好勢；啊若去市仔買菜，毋著價數相比並才袂予人貴去，伊煞講伊上班人無時間，佮意就買，出價傷費氣；猶閣有咧，菜是煮甲規大碗，食袂了，講：「鍛過的菜無營養，有食佮無食仝款。」倒掉較規氣。

Lun7-chin, goan2 sin-pu7 iau2 sng3 iu2-hau3--lah, m7-koh kan-tann u7 chit8 pou7 be7 kho2-chhu2--tit, to7 si7 siunn koe3-thau5 tho2-che3.Phi3-ju7 kong2, sui2-sann chit8nia2 chit8nia2 tit8-tit8 be2, chiah chheng7 chit8 nng7 pai2, to7 theh8 khi3 kiu3-che3, kong2 siann2-mih ku7-sann hiam5 tin3-te3, sang3 hou7 pat8-lang5 khah ho2-se3; ah8 na7 khi3 chhi7-a2 be2 chhai3, m7-tioh8 ke3-siau3 sio pi2-pheng7 chiah be7 hou7 lang5 kui3--khi3, i soah kong2 i siong7-pan-lang5 bo5 si5-kan, kah-i3 to7 be2, chhut-ke3 siunn hui3-khi3; iau2 koh u7--leh, chhai3 si7 chu2 kah kui toa7 oann2, chiah8 be7 liau2, kong2: “Thng7--koe3 e5 chhai3 bo5 eng5-iong2, u7 chiah8 kap bo5 chiah8 kang7-khoan2.” To3 tiau7 khah kui-khi3.
見若看著魚魚肉肉倒倒掉，我看著心肝實在足毋甘的，就會共伊擋講：「毋通摒掉，予我食。」食規盤个隔暝菜以後，你講，鮮的菜我kam2猶閣食會落去？我這个做大家的煞專門咧窮新婦的凊菜呢！我定定咧想講：按呢我毋就袂輸豬仔咧？毋閣也無人逼我啊，是我家己毋甘損蕩五穀才抾起來食的，欲怨啥人？唉！真正是「勤儉食隔暝菜」啦！

Kinn3-na7 khoann3 tioh8 hi5-hi5 bah-bah to3-to3 tiau7, goa2 khoann3 tioh8 sim-koann sit8-chai7 chiok m7-kam--e5, to7 e7 ka7 i tong3 kong2: “M7-thang phiann tiau7, hou7 goa2 chiah8.” Chiah8 kui poann5 e5 keh-me5-chhai3 i2-au7, li2 kong2, chhinn e5 chhai3 goa2 kam2 iau2 koh chiah8 e7 loh8--khi3? Goa2 chit e5 cho3 ta-ke--e5 soah choan-bun5 leh kheng5 sin-pu7 e5 chhin3-chhai3 neh! Goa2 tiann7-tiann7 leh siunn7 kong2: an2-ne goa2 m7 to7 be7-su ti-a2--leh? M7-koh ia7 bo5 lang5 pek--goa2-a, si7 goa2 ka-ti7 m7-kam sng2-tng7 gou7-kok chiah khioh khi2lai5 chiah8--e5, beh oan3 siann2-lang5? Aih! Chin-chiann3 si7 “khin5-khiam7 chiah8 keh-me5-chhai3”--lah!

毋但按呢。閣較嚥氣的是阮囝也綴人咧時行，趁這擺過年放假，規家伙仔tshua7去外國度假，放我一个老人顧厝。我愈想愈毋甘願，按呢我毋就袂輸狗呢！所以就想欲走來去查某囝兜tshit迌。毋閣菜閣賰一大堆，叫我按怎行會開跤啦？啊！著！隔壁有飼狗，貯寡仔來去予狗食。僥倖ooh！恁臆隔壁的ok-sang3按怎講？伊講：「努力ooh！毋免啦！阮兜的狗攏食飼料，無欲食凊飯菜，你留咧家己食就好啦。」聽一下有夠嚥氣的，「唉！真正是勤儉比狗較毋值」。我都無咧歹命閣！我欲共伊討債一遍，共伊倒掉，管待伊去予雷公摃死。

M7-na7 an2-ne. Koh-khah ian3-khi3--e5 si7 goan2 kiann2 ia7 toe3 lang5 leh si5-kiann5, than3 chit pai2 koe3-ni5 pang3-ka2, kui-ke-hoe2-a2 chhoa7 khi3 goa7-kok tou7-ka2, pang3 goa2 chit8 e5 lau7-lang5 kou3-chhu3. Goa2 ju2 siunn7 ju2 m7 kam-goan7, an2-ne goa2 m7 to7 be7-su kau2 neh! Sou2-i2 to7 siunn7 beh chau2 lai5 khi3 cha-bou2-kiann2 tau chhit-tho5. M7-koh chhai3 koh chhun chit8 toa7 tui, kio3 goa2 an2-choann2 kiann5 e7 khui-kha--lah? Ah! Tioh8! Keh-piah u7 chhi7-kau2, te2 koa2-a2 lai5 khi3 hou7 kau2 chiah8. Hiau-heng7--ouh! Lin2 ioh keh-piah e5 ok-sang3 an2-choann2 kong2? I kong2: “Lou2-lat8--ouh!M7 bian2--lah! Goan2 tau e5 kau2 long2 chiah8 chhi7-liau7, bo5 beh chiah8 chhin3-png7-chhai3, li2 lau5 leh ka-ti7 chiah8 to7 ho2--lah.” Thiann--chit8-e7 u7-kau3 ian3-khi3--e5, “Aih! Chin-chiann3 si7 khin5-khiam7 pi2 kau2 khah m7-tat8”. Goa2 to bo5 leh phainn2-mia7 koh! Goa2 beh ka7 i tho2-che3 chit8 pian3, ka7 i to3 tiau7, koan2-thai7 i khi3 hou7 lui5-kong kong3--si2.
彼擺風颱做煞，規个草山的樹仔攏吹甲東倒西歪，有的三節六曲，有的欲死蕩幌，有的去予車kauh 甲平平平，規支山袂輸去予人空襲過仝款。毋閣算來，月桃花佮海芋仔也誠好運，因為經過這个風颱，in無去予伊搧倒去無打緊，閣生甲愈青翠，花嘛開甲愈媠。

Hit pai2 hong-thai cho3 soah, kui e5 Chhau2-soann e5 chhiu7-a2 long2 chhoe kah tang-to2 sai-oai, u7 e5 sann chatlak8 khiau, u7 e5 behsi2 tong7-hainn3, u7 e5 khi3 hou7 chhia kauh kah penn5-penn5-penn5, kui ki soann be7-su khi3 hou7 lang5 khong-sip8--koe3 kang7-khoan2. M7-koh sng3--lai5, goeh8-tho5-hoe kap hai2-ou5-a2 ia7 chiann5 ho2-un7, in-ui7 keng-koe3 chit e5 hong-thai, in bo5 khi3 hou7 i sian3 to2 khi3 bo5 tann2-kin2, koh senn kah ju2 chhenn-chhui3, hoe ma7 khui kah ju2 sui2.

彼工日頭炎炎，規个草山嘛沓沓仔咧回復伊較早的光景。海芋仔就共月桃花講：「誠久無人來共咱參觀佮呵咾矣呢！」月桃花應講：「是啊！親像你這款遐爾高尚，遐爾媠的花，無人來欣賞，實在是真無采。若阮呢，出世就是歹命囝，佇山邊家己討食，家己大漢，運氣若好，拄著仔開一下仔花咧，kam2有人會佮意咧？」當月桃花的喙猶閣咧mauh咧mauh咧的時，山跤傳來一陣仔一陣的歌聲，歌聲愈來愈倚近，聽起來親像是少年家的款。聽著有人來，海芋仔心肝就phih8-phok8-tshainn2，歡喜甲擋袂牢，根本都無心情聽月桃花咧講遐的五四三的。

Hit kang jit8-thau5 iam7-iam7, kui e5 Chhau2-soann ma7 tauh8-tauh8-a2 leh hoe5-hok8 i khah-cha2 e5 kong-keng2. Hai2-ou5-a2 to7 ka7 goeh8-tho5-hoe kong2: “Chiann5 ku2 bo5 lang5 lai5 ka7 lan2 chham-koan kap o-lo2--a neh!” Goeh8-tho5-hoe in3 kong2: “Si7 ah! Chhin-chhiunn7 li2 chit khoan2 hiah-ni7 ko-siong2, hiah-ni7 sui2 e5 hoe, bo5 lang5 lai5 him-siong2, sit8-chai7 si7 chin bo5-chhai2. Na7 goan2 neh, chhut-si3 to7 si7 phainn2-mia7-kiann2, ti7 soann-pinn ka-ti7 tho2-chiah8, ka-ti7 toa7-han3, un7-khi3 na7 ho2, tu2--tioh8-a khui chit8-e7-a2 hoe--leh, kam2 u7 lang5 e7 kah-i3--leh?” Tng goeh8-tho5-hoe e5 chhui3 iau2 koh leh mauh--leh mauh--leh e5 si5, soann-kha thoan5 lai5 chit8-chun7-a2 chit8-chun7 e5 koa-siann, koa-siann ju2 lai5 ju2 oa2-kin7, thiann--khi2-lai5 chhin-chhiunn7 si7 siau3-lian5-ke e5 khoan2. Thiann tioh8 u7 lang5 lai5, hai2-ou5-a2 sim-koann to7 phih8-phok8-chhainn2, hoann-hi2 kah tong3 be7 tiau5, kin-pun2 to bo5 sim-cheng5 thiann goeh8-tho5-hoe leh kong2 hiah-e5 gou7-si3-sann--e5.
遮的少年家聽講是大學生，來草山欲採集標本佮參觀農民種海芋仔。Intai7先看著月桃花，有的人講是「野薑花」，嘛有人講是「月桃花」，一句來、一句去，相諍袂煞。逐家就遐挽一蕊，遮挽一蕊，無偌久，逐家攏mooh規把規把的月桃花。

Chiah-e5 siau3-lian5-ke thiann kong2 si7 tai7-hak8-seng, lai5 Chhau2-soann beh chhai2-chip8 phiau-pun2 kapchham-koanlong5-bin5 cheng3 hai2-ou5-a2. In tai7-seng khoann3 tioh8 goeh8-tho5-hoe, u7 e5 lang5 kong2 si7 “ia2-kiunn-hoe”, ma7 u7 lang5 kong2 si7 ”goeh8-tho5-hoe”, chit8 ku3 lai5, chit8 ku3 khi3, sio-chinn3 be7 soah. Tak8-ke to7 hia ban2 chit8 lui2, chia ban2 chit8 lui2, bo5 joa7 ku2, tak8-ke long2 mouh kui pe2 kui pe2 e5 goeh8-tho5-hoe.
時間過得誠緊，猶未參觀海芋仔田，就已經過半晝矣！In就共規把規把的月桃花紮落山去。這个情景，海芋仔看佇目睭內，心肝頭又閣受氣又閣怨妒。

Si5-kan koe3 tit chiann5 kin2, iau2-boe7chham-koanhai2-ou5-a2-chhan5, to7 i2-keng koe3 poann3-tau3--a! In to7 ka7 kui pe2 kui pe2 e5 goeh8-tho5-hoe chah loh8-soann khi3. Chit e5 cheng5-keng2, hai2-ou5-a2 khoann3 ti7 bak8-chiu lai7, sim-koann-thau5 iu7-koh siu7-khi3 iu7-koh oan3-tou7.
遮的學生轉去了後，就共月桃花插佇花矸仔內底。宿舍的人看著，毋是呵咾花媠，就是好奇咧問東問西。月桃花家己也感覺真光彩，這是伊自細漢到今上囂俳的一工。

Chiah-e5 hak8-seng tng2--khi3 liau2-au7, to7 ka7 goeh8-tho5-hoe chhah ti7 hoe-kan-a2 lai7-te2. Sok-sia3 e5 lang5 khoann3--tioh8,m7 si7o-lo2 hoe sui2, to7 si7honn3-ki5 leh mng7 tang mng7 sai. Goeh8-tho5-hoe ka-ti7 ia7 kam2-kak chin kong-chhai2, che si7 i chu7 se3-han3 kau3-tann siong7 hiau-pai e5 chit8 kang.
一禮拜後，遮的學生為著欲趕一份報告，又閣上草山去參觀海芋仔，也順紲紮幾若把海芋仔轉來。海芋仔看著冷吱吱的花矸仔內插著蔫去的月桃花，就大聲笑講：「無路用的跤數。」當然，月桃花是難逃去予人擲去糞堆的命運looh！

Chit8 le2-pai3 au7, chiah-e5 hak8-seng ui7 tioh8 beh koann2 chit8 hun7 po3-ko3, iu7-koh chiunn7 Chhau2-soann khi3chham-koanhai2-ou5-a2, ia7 sin7-soa3 chah kui2-na7 pe2hai2-ou5-a2 tng2--lai5. Hai2-ou5-a2 khoann3 tioh8 leng2-ki-ki e5 hoe-kan-a2 lai7 chhah tioh8 lian--khi3 e5 goeh8-tho5-hoe, to7 toa7-siann chhio3 kong2: “Bo5 lou7-iong7 e5 kha-siau3.” Tong-jian5, goeh8-tho5-hoe si7 lan5-to5khi3 hou7 lang5 tan3 khi3 pun3-tui e5 mia7-un7 louh!

閣一禮拜後，月桃花靠著淡薄仔thoo5氣佮露水，小可有咧puh穎。這陣，糞埽車閣來倒糞圾，月桃花看著海芋仔也佇新糞堆內，伊就共海芋仔講：「海芋仔兄，真罕行按怎！」海芋仔連喢都攏無愛喢伊，月桃花閣紲落去講：「其實，咱攏仝款，生媠生bai2毋是攏予人當做tshit迌物仔咧耍，落尾嘛著予人擲hiat-kak8，咱攏是歹命囝，應該互相鬥相共才著。無，規氣按呢啦！若準咱兩个攏活落去，有物通食，咱公家分，啊若kan-tann你活落去，我去予伊蔫去，我就做肥料共你拱，若無，就換你共我拱，你想按怎？」海芋仔猶原激一个氣，越頭做伊去。

Koh chit8 le2-pai3 au7, goeh8-tho5-hoe kho3 tioh8 tam7-poh8-a2 thou5-khi3 kap lou7-chui2, sio2-khoa2 u7 leh puh-inn2. Chit-chun7, pun3-so3-chhia koh lai5 to3 pun3-so3, goeh8-tho5-hoe khoann3 tioh8 hai2-ou5-a2 ia7 ti7 sin pun3-tui lai7, i to7 ka7 hai2-ou5-a2 kong2: “Hai2-ou5-a2 hiann, chin han2-kiann5 an2-choann2!” Hai2-ou5-a2 lian7 chhap to long2 bo5-ai3 chhap--i, goeh8-tho5-hoe koh soa3 loh8khi3 kong2: “Ki5-sit8, lan2 long2 kang7-khoan2, senn sui2 senn bai2m7 si7long2 hou7 lang5 tong3-cho3 chhit-tho5 mih8-a2 leh sng2, lou7-boe2 ma7 tioh8 hou7 lang5 tan3 hiat-kak8,lan2 long2 si7 phainn2-mia7-kiann2, eng-kai hou7-siong tau3-sann-kang7 chiah tioh8. Bo5, kui-khi3 an2-ne--lah! Na7 chun2 lan2 nng7 e5 long2 oah8--loh8-khi3, u7 mih8 thang chiah8, lan2 kong-ke pun, ah8 na7 kan-tann li2 oah8--loh8-khi3, goa2 khi3 hou7 i lian--khi3, goa2 to7 cho3 pui5-liau7 ka7 li2 keng7, na7 bo5, to7 oann7 li2 ka7 goa2 keng7, li2 siunn7 an2-choann2?” Hai2-ou5-a2 iu5-goan5 kek chit8 e5 khui3, oat8-thau5 cho3 i khi3.
無偌久，糞堆內也無看著月桃花，嘛無看著海芋仔，kan-tann看著一抱草綴風咧幌咧幌咧。
Bo5 joa7 ku2, pun3-tui lai7 ia7 bo5 khoann3 tioh8 goeh8-tho5-hoe, ma7 bo5 khoann3 tioh8 hai2-ou5-a2, kan-tann khoann3 tioh8 chit8 pho7 chhau2 toe3 hong leh hainn3--leh hainn3--leh.

段: 未讀冊以前，厝kan-tann是我食飯、洗身軀的所在。因為囡仔透早食飯飽就出去tshue7囡仔伴tshit迌，tshit迌甲無晝無暗。較早的囡仔無人掛錶仔，哪會知影食飯時間到矣未？佗一口灶若飯煮熟，就咻in囝轉去，較聽話的抑是較惜皮的，就知影好緊轉去，才袂討皮痛，較蠻皮的著愛父母攑箠仔佇後壁押。

Boe7 thak8-chheh i2-cheng5, chhu3 kan-tann si7 goa2 chiah8-png7, se2 sin-khu e5 sou2-chai7. In-ui7 gin2-a2 thau3-cha2 chiah8-png7-pa2 to7 chhut khi3 chhoe7 gin2-a2-phoann7 chhit-tho5, chhit-tho5 kah bo5 tau3 bo5 am3. Khah-cha2 e5 gin2-a2 bo5 lang5 koa3 pio2-a2, nah e7 chai-iann2 chiah8-png7 si5-kan kau3--a boe7? Toh chit8 khau2-chau3 na7 png7 chu2-sek8, to7 hiu in kiann2 tng2--khi3, khah thiann-oe7--e5iah si7khah sioh-phoe5--e5, to7 chai-iann2 ho2 kin2 tng2--khi3, chiah be7 tho2 phoe5 thiann3, khah ban5-phoe5--e5 tioh8-ai3 pe7-bu2 giah8 chhoe5-a2 ti7 au7-piah ah.
以前，看食飯就知影查某人佮囡仔的地位，囡仔是飯貯貯咧，菜挾挾咧去邊仔食，查某人煮飯煮熟，著愛等查poo人佮囡仔食飽了，才來窮菜尾，食飯飽閣愛收桌頂、洗碗箸。這種情況tsit-ma2佇庄跤猶看會著。

I2-cheng5, khoann3 chiah8-png7 to7 chai-iann2 cha-bou2-lang5 kap gin2-a2 e5 te7-ui7, gin2-a2 si7 png7 te2-te2--leh, chhai3 ngeh-ngeh--leh khi3 pinn--a2 chiah8, cha-bou2-lang5 chu2-png7 chu2-sek8, tioh8-ai3 tan2 cha-pou-lang5 kap gin2-a2 chiah8-pa2 liau2, chiah lai5 kheng5 chhai3-boe2, chiah8-png7-pa2 koh ai3 siu toh-teng2, se2 oann2-ti7. Chit chiong2 cheng5-hong2 chit-ma2 ti7 chng-khaiau2 khoann3 e7 tioh8.
阮老爸in兄弟隨人食了後，阮一家大細攏tua3 做伙，食飯一定是等到人齊到才會當動箸，挾菜的時就會先分做五份，阮爸仔配菜有夠省，只要有鹹就食會落飯，驚伊毋甘配菜。有時伊較晏轉來，就會罵阮「也毋先食！愛食冷飯是無？」雖然hong5罵，毋閣心肝內嘛真溫暖。

對阿姑的喙裡講出遮濟話，閣講甲遮爾清楚，講正經的真正是頭一擺拄著。自細漢到今，阿姑佮阮講話袂超過三句，有tang時仔咧唅伊講話，伊連應嘛無愛應，kan-tann會共你笑笑咧nia5。

Senn te7-it the e5 si5 si7 chit8 e5 cha-bou2--e5, hit-chun7 goa2 bat tai7-chi3--a, khoann3 e7 chhutlai5 hit e5 gin2-a2 bo5 cheng3-siong5, m7-na7 gong7-gong7, koh si7 nng2-kut--e5, che7 to che7 be7 chai7, chhi7 iau2-boe7 tou7-che3 to7 phainn2--khi3-a! 這个囡仔叫做阿國仔，今年二十八歲猶未娶，佇伊十七、八歲仔彼當陣，厝邊隔壁遐的厚話的查某人共thok頭講伊毋是姑丈in兩个親生的，阿國仔擋袂牢煞起掠狂，講袂伸捙，鬧足久攏毋煞。姑丈投甲目屎流目屎滴，怨嘆這个囡仔白飼矣；阿姑半句攏無愛講，目屎吞腹內，真認命。阮攏共翁仔某安搭講聽候伊較大漢就會曉想啦，勸in莫煩惱遐濟。講那咧講咧，我看會出來阿姑一定會捶心肝，想講命運呔會遮爾創治人，害伊食老無甲半个囝兒序細通佇身軀邊有孝，閣著愛予這个來蹧躂，毋知影欲共啥人討公道。伊的心已經冷一kueh8，毋知通寒。

Chit e5 gin2-a2 kio3-cho3 A-kok--a2, kin-ni5 ji7-chap8-peh hoe3 iau2-boe7 chhoa7, ti7 i chap8-chhit, peh hoe3-a2 hit-tang-chun7, chhu3-pinn keh-piah hiah-e5 kau7-oe7 e5 cha-bou2-lang5 ka7 thok-thau5 kong2 im7 si7kou-tiunn7 in nng7 e5 chhin-senn--e5, A-kok--a2 tong3 be7 tiau5 soah khi2-liah8-kong5, kong2 be7 chhun-chhia, nau7 chiok ku2 long2 m7 soah. Kou-tiunn7 tau5 kah bak8-sai2 lau5 bak8-sai2 tih, oan3-than3 chit e5 gin2-a2 pe8-chhi7--a; a-kou poann3 ku3 long2 bo5-ai3 kong2, bak8-sai2 thun pak-lai7, chin jin7-mia7. Goan2 long2 ka7 ang-a2-bou2 an-tah kong2 theng3-hau7 i khah toa7-han3 to7 e7-hiau2 siunn7--lah, khng3 in mai3 hoan5-lo2 hiah che7. Kong2 na2 leh kong2--leh, goa2 khoann3 e7 chhutlai5 a-kou it-teng7 e7 tui5 sim-koann, siunn7 kong2 mia7-un7 thai3 e7 chiah-ni7 chhong3-ti7--lang5, hai7 i chiah8-lau7 bo5 kah poann3 e5 kiann2-ji5 si7-se3 thang ti7 sin-khu-pinn iu2-hau3, koh tioh8-ai3 hou7 chit e5 lai5 chau-that, m7 chai-iann2 beh ka7 siann2-lang5 tho2 kong-to7. I e5 sim i2-keng leng2 chit8 koeh8,m7 chaithang koann5.
佳哉，阿國仔是阿姑疼有落心，到尾有想通，厝裡才閣回復平靜。這遍，阿姑過身欲開的，外省仔姑丈講會省的盡量省，顧活人毋通顧死人，逐項攏無愛開，連告別式的兩萬五嘛欲省起來；是阿國仔開喙講欲開的，講老母規世人攏無享受著，毋捌tshit迌過，tsit-ma2人死矣，上無，嘛愛予伊昌颷一下。這个阿國仔真正有共阿姑當做親生的咧看待，可惜有較慢淡薄仔。

Ka-chai3, A-kok--a2 si7 a-kou thiann3 u7 loh8-sim, kau3-boe2 u7 siunn7 thong, chhu3--nih chiah koh hoe5-hok8 peng5-cheng7. Chit pian3, a-kou koe3-sin beh khai--e5, goa7-seng2-a2 kou-tiunn7 kong2 e7 seng2--e5 chin7-liong7 seng2, kou3 oah8-lang5 m7-thang kou3 si2-lang5, tak8 hang7 long2 bo5-ai3 khai, lian7 ko3-piat8-sek e5 nng7-ban7-gou7 ma7 beh seng2--khi2-lai5; si7 A-kok--a2 khui-chhui3 kong2 beh khai--e5, kong2 lau7-bu2 kui-si3-lang5 long2 bo5 hiang2-siu7--tioh8,m7 batchhit-tho5--koe3, chit-ma2 lang5 si2--a, siong7 bo5, ma7 ai3 hou7 i chhiann-iann7--chit8-e7. Chit e5 A-kok--a2 chin-chiann3 u7 ka7 a-kou tong3-cho3 chhin-senn--e5 leh khoann3-thai7, kho2-sioh u7 khah ban7--tam7-poh8-a2.
出山彼工來拈香的攏是外省仔姑丈較早戶政的同事唅做兵仔伴，無甲半个阿姑的朋友，這嘛莫怪啦，阿姑規世人攏咧醫病，kan-tann糖尿病的症頭就帶三、四十年，逐工一定愛一支射，若是藥仔就閣較免講，攏無斷的；阿叔對伊死的看法，講彼是一種解脫。

Chhut-soann hit kang lai5 liam5-hiunn--e5 long2 si7 goa7-seng2-a2 kou-tiunn7 khah-cha2 hou7-cheng3 e5 tong5-su7 ham7 cho3-peng-a2-phoann7, bo5 kah poann3 e5 a-kou e5 peng5-iu2, che ma7 bok8-koai3--lah, a-kou kui-si3-lang5 long2 leh i-penn7, kan-tann thng5-jio7-penn7 e5 cheng3-thau5 to7 tai3 sann, si3-chap8 ni5, tak8 kang it-teng7 ai3 chit8 ki sia7, na7 si7 ioh8-a2 to7 koh-khah bian2 kong2, long2 bo5 tng7--e5; a-chek tui3 i si2 e5 khoann3-hoat, kong2 he si7 chit8 chiong2 kai2-thoat.
家祭的時，我看著一个生份的查某人，我掠準是姑丈河北遐的親情咧，問起來才知影是進前有來佮阿姑相認的查某囝；這个查某囝，人佮阿姑精差無兩里遠，母仔囝煞分開四、五十年才相認，這實在佮阿姑捌起痟過有真大的牽連。

Ka-che3 e5 si5, goa2 khoann3 tioh8 chit8 e5 chhenn-hun7 e5 cha-bou2-lang5, goa2 liah8-chun2 si7 kou-tiunn7 Ho5-pak hia e5 chhin-chiann5--leh, mng7--khi2-lai5 chiah chai-iann2 si7 chin3-cheng5 u7 lai5 kap a-kou sio-jin7 e5 cha-bou2-kiann2; chit e5 cha-bou2-kiann2, lang5 kap a-kou cheng-chha bo5 nng7 li2 hng7, bu2-a2-kiann2 soah hun-khui si3, gou7-chap8 ni5 chiah sio-jin7, che sit8-chai7 kap a-kou bat khi2-siau2--koe3 u7 chin toa7 e5 khan-lian5.
阿爸又閣再起性地，阿母敲電話來問欲按怎？我欲上班，這陣無法度轉去，kan-tann會當安慰阿母，叫伊毋通著急，等一下我才請假轉去處理……

A-pa iu7koh-chai3 khi2 seng3-te7, a-bu2 kha3 tian7-oe7 lai5 mng7 beh an2-choann2? Goa2 beh siong7-pan, chit-chun7 bo5 hoat-tou7 tng2--khi3, kan-tann e7-tang3an-ui3 a-bu2, kio3 i m7-thang tioh8-kip, tan2--chit8-e7 goa2 chiah chheng2-ka2 tng2khi3 chhu2-li2......
八十三歲的阿爸，二十外年前得著糖尿病，對彼陣開始，阿爸就定定愛食藥仔佮注射。少年時的阿爸，漢草瘦抽，牽一副烏框的目鏡，生做真緣投，佇鐵道部食頭路，是司機員的助理。阿爸細漢的時，爸母離緣，老母改嫁，六歲的時，老爸娶後母，對彼陣開始過著無爸母疼惜，嘛無家庭溫暖的日子。七歲的時著愛鬥做瓜笠仔佮厝內的工課，閣著看顧仝爸各母的小弟、小妹。彼種無依無倚的心情，正港是欲哭無目屎，委屈無人知。

Peh-chap8-sann hoe3 e5 a-pa, ji7-chap8 goa7 ni5 cheng5 tit tioh8 thng5-jio7-penn7, ui3 hit-chun7 khai-si2, a-pa to7 tiann7-tiann7 ai3 chiah8 ioh8-a2 kap chu3-sia7. Siau3-lian5-si5 e5 a-pa, han3-chhau2 san2-thiu, khan chit8 hu3 ou-kheng e5 bak8-kiann3, senn-cho3 chin ian5-tau5, ti7 thih-to7-pou7 chiah8 thau5-lou7, si7 su-ki-oan5 e5 chou7-li2. A-pa se3-han3 e5 si5, pe7-bu2 li7-ian5, lau7-bu2 kai2-ke3, lak8 hoe3 e5 si5, lau7-pe7 chhoa7 au7-bu2, tui3 hit-chun7 khai-si2 koe3 tioh8 bo5 pe7-bu2 thiann3-sioh, ma7 bo5 ka-teng5 un-loan2 e5 jit8-chi2. Chhit hoe3 e5 si5 tioh8-ai3 tau3 cho3 koe-leh8-a2 kap chhu3-lai7 e5 khang-khoe3, koh tioh8 khoann3-kou3 kang7pe7 kohbu2 e5 sio2-ti7, sio2-moe7. Hit chiong2 bo5-i bo5-oa2 e5 sim-cheng5, chiann3-kang2 si7 beh khau3 bo5 bak8-sai2, ui2-khut bo5 lang5 chai.

十四歲閃過一擺比「九二一」閣較嚴重的地動，佇台灣受日本統治的時代，阿爸走空襲、覕炸彈，嘛捌去過廣東做日本兵。二十五歲娶某，開始獨立生活，tua3 的是thoo5埆仔厝，一塊碗、一雙箸，攏是翁仔某兩个人靠家己的雙手拍拚得來的。生六个囡仔，三个後生、三个查某囝。斯當時，靠阿爸一个人領的月給，實在無夠予囡仔註冊佮日常的生活費用，除去種田有淡薄仔收入，阿母閣愛擔潘、飼豬、種菜、賣菜，閣兼做雜差仔工加減來補貼。

Chap8-si3 hoe3 siam2 koe3 chit8 pai2 pi2 “kiu2-ji7-it” koh-khah giam5-tiong7 e5 te7-tang7, ti7 Tai5-oan5 siu7 Jit8-pun2 thong2-ti7 e5 si5-tai7, a-pa chau2 khong-sip8, bih cha3-toann5, ma7 bat khi3 koe3 Kng2-tang cho3 Jit8-pun2-peng. Ji7-chap8-gou7 hoe3 chhoa7-bou2, khai-si2 tok8-lip8 seng-oah8, toa3--e5 si7 thou5-kak-a2-chhu3, chit8 te3 oann2, chit8 siang ti7, long2 si7 ang-a2-bou2 nng7 e5 lang5 kho3 ka-ti7 e5 siang-chhiu2 phah-piann3 tit--lai5-e5. Senn lak8 e5 gin2-a2, sann e5 hau7-senn, sann e5 cha-bou2-kiann2. Su-tong-si5, kho3 a-pa chit8 e5 lang5 nia2 e5 goeh8-kip, sit8-chai7 bo5-kau3 hou7 gin2-a2 chu3-chheh kap jit8-siong5 e5 seng-oah8 hui3-iong7, tu5-khi3 cheng3-chhan5 u7 tam7-poh8-a2 siu-jip8, a-bu2 koh ai3 tann-phun, chhi7-ti, cheng3-chhai3, be7-chhai3, koh kiam cho3 chap8-chhe-a2-kang ke-kiam2 lai5 pou2-thiap.

過去，阿爸有一暫仔真放蕩，興跋筊、啉酒。一直到我出世，三歲的時著小兒麻痺症，阿爸佮阿母揹我四界tshue7醫生，為著欲窮我的醫藥費，阿爸徹底改筊。下班了後去踏三輪車、揹番薯薟、走烏巿增加收入。另外，閣tshue7師傅學接骨共我推跤。到六歲彼年我才開始學行路。阿爸不時咧講，彼陣的醫藥費，若用十箍的紙票疊起來，比tsit-ma2的我閣較懸。雖罔我行路猶是不便，毋閣日常活動無受影響，這攏愛感謝阿爸佮阿母無暝無日共我照顧，經過這段艱苦的日子，致蔭我這世人過甲幸福、快樂。

Koe3-khi3, a-pa u7 chit8-cham7-a2 chin hong3-tong7, heng3 poah8-kiau2, lim-chiu2. Ha7-pan liau2-au7 khi3 tah8 sann-lian2-chhia, phainn7 han-chi5-chhiam, chau2 ou-chhi7 cheng-ka siu-jip8. Leng7-goa7, koh chhoe7 sai-hu7 oh8 chiap-kut ka7 goa2 thui-kha. Kau3 lak8 hoe3 hit ni5 goa2 chiah khai-si2 oh8 kiann5-lou7. A-pa put-si5 leh kong2, hit-chun7 e5 i-ioh8-hui3, na7 iong7 chap8 khou e5 choa2-phio3 thiap8--khi2-lai5, pi2 chit-ma2 e5 goa2 koh-khah koan5. Sui-bong2 goa2 kiann5-lou7 iau2 si7 put-pian7, m7-koh jit8-siong5 oah8-tang7 bo5 siu7 eng2-hiong2, che long2 ai3 kam2-sia7 a-pa kap a-bu2 bo5-me5 bo5-jit8 ka7 goa2 chiau3-kou3, keng-koe3 chit toann7kan-khou2 e5 jit8-chi2, ti3-im3goa2 chit-si3-lang5 koe3 kah heng7-hok, khoai3-lok8.

武松是阿爸的名，伊的個性佮武松拍虎故事內底的主角真仝款，做人講信用、重義氣，不時幫助親情朋友。跋筊輸錢是伊這世人上大的失敗，伊四常苦勸人毋通跋筊才袂家庭四散。為著我，阿爸去學漢醫接骨，平常時若有患者來tshue7伊，伊攏用做好的藥仔，盡全力替人醫治，若是散赤人，毋但看診免費，閣會提錢救濟人，人攏講伊是再世華陀。伊興研究藥方，閒的時愛種一寡藥草，厝前、厝後不時都看會著阿爸認真工作的身影，總是誠有精神，氣勢十足。

Bu2-siong5 si7 a-pa e5 mia5, i e5 ko3-seng3 kap Bu2 Siong5 phah hou2 kou3-su7 lai7-te2 e5 chu2-kak chin kang7-khoan2, cho3-lang5 kong2 sin3-iong7, tiong7 gi7-khi3, put-si5 pang-chou7 chhin-chiann5 peng5-iu2. Poah8-kiau2 su-chinn5 si7 i chit-si3-lang5 siong7 toa7 e5 sit-pai7, i su3-siong5 khou2-khng3 lang5 m7-thang poah8-kiau2 chiah be7 ka-teng5 si3-soann3. Ui7 tioh8 goa2, a-pa khi3 oh8 Han3-i chiap-kut, peng5-siong5-si5 na7 u7 hoan7-chia2 lai5 chhoe7--i, i long2 iong7 cho3 ho2 e5 ioh8-a2, chin7 choan5-lek8 the3 lang5 i-ti7, na7 si7 san3-chhiah-lang5, m7-na7 khoann3-chin2 bian2-hui3, koh e7 theh8-chinn5 kiu3-che3--lang5, lang5 long2 kong2 i si7 chai3-se3 Hoa5-to5. I heng3 gian2-kiu3 ioh8-hng, eng5 e5 si5 ai3 cheng3 chit8-koa2 ioh8-chhau2, chhu3-cheng5, chhu3-au7 put-si5 to khoann3 e7 tioh8 a-pa jin7-chin kang-chok e5 sin-iann2, chong2--si7 chiann5 u7 cheng-sin5, khi3-se3 chap8-chiok.

阿爸五十五歲退休，仝彼年大兄想欲開工場欠本錢。阿爸共伊領著的勞保退休金攏予大兄。正經是爸母疼囝長流水。伊向望大兄後日仔會當較有出脫。經過二十外年的經營，大兄、二兄、三兄鬥陣搰力拍拚，當初時阿爸提出的資本，毋但早就趁轉來，較早彼間細細間的工場佇三兄弟仝心拍拚之下，現此時嘛成做一間有規模的公司矣。這是阿兄的成就，嘛是阿爸的驕傲。會記得阿公欲過身的時共阿爸講：「恁翁仔某終其尾也出頭天啦。」阿爸聽著感覺誠有面子。

It-poann-tek8, khan-ti-ko--e5 long2 si7 thau5 ti3 khoe-leh8, chhiu2 giah8 tek-chhoe5, keng-kah tann chit8 kha se3 kha poah8-thang2, khou3-kha pih kah kha-tou7-jin5 koan5, chhui3--nih pin-nng5 na2 pou7na2 hainn koa-a2-tiau7, chhiunn7 koa-si leh liam7--e5 an2-ne----chiah8 pin-nng5, ang5-chhui3-khou. Hit ki tek-chhoe5 si7 beh lai5 koann2 ti-ko--e5. Ah8 na7 hit kha poah8-thang2, thiann kong2 u7 nng7 khoan2 lou7-iong7. Chit8 khoan2 si7 ti-ko kiann5 hng7-lou7, kiann5 kah chhoan2-phinn7-phenn7, sio-hong7-hong7, su3-ki nng2-he5-he5, khan-ti-ko--e5 chiah iong7 kha-thang2 chui2 ka7 iunn2 kui2 khok-a2 lam3-lam3--leh, sio2 hioh-liang5--chit8-e7 chiah koh ke3-siok8 koann2-lou7. Leng7-goa7 chit8 khoan2 kong2-hoat, soeh kong2 ti7 ti-ko kap ti-bu2 phah-cheng2 liau2-au7, khan-ti-ko e7 iunn2 chit8 khok chui2, phoah tui3 ti e5 sin-khu teng2, chhui3 liam7 kong2: “Lam3 chit8 khok leng2-chui2, hou7 lin2 senn chap8-ji7 e5 sui2 sui2.” Kong2 chiah-e5 ho2-oe7, tho2 chit8-koa2 ho2 chhai2-thau5. Chu2-lang5 thiann liau2 ma7 sim liang5 phi5-thou2 khui, sui5 ka7 chhoan5 chit8 pau toa7-toa7-e5 hou7 ang5.
話一下拋倒轉來，拍種猶原是一種的學問，無二步七仔是無路來。飼豬的人飼久就變老tau5會曉斷講豬母tang時會起痟，紲落去佮牽豬哥的講價數，約束時間。飼豬的kan-tann看豬母尻川髀彼粒紅貢貢的「尿kui仔」，閣候咧四、五工轉烏，著聽好喊牽豬哥的來拍種矣，這號做豬母咧「走醒」（起痟），按呢時間掠hoo7準，若無啊，傷早傷晏攏袂牢種。

Oe7 chit8-e7 pha to3-tng2--lai5, phah-cheng2 iu5-goan5 si7 chit8 chiong2 e5 hak8-bun7, bo5nng7-pou7-chhit-a2 si7 bo5 lou7 lai5. Chhi7-ti e5 lang5 chhi7 ku2 to7 pian3 lau2-tau5 e7-hiau2 toan3 kong2 ti-bu2 tang-si5 e7 khi2-siau2, soa3--loh8-khi3 kap khan-ti-ko--e5 kong2 ke3-siau3, iok-sok si5-kan. Chhi7-ti--e5 kan-tann khoann3 ti-bu2 kha-chhng-phoe2 hit liap8 ang5-kong3-kong3 e5 “jio7-kui-a2”, koh hau7 leh si3, gou7 kang tng2 ou, tioh8 theng3-ho2 hiam3 khan-ti-ko--e5 lai5 phah-cheng2--a, che ho7-cho3 ti-bu2 leh “chau2-chhenn2” (khi2-siau2), an2-ne si5-kan liah8 hou7 chun2, na7 bo5 ah, siunn cha2 siunn oann3 long2 be7 tiau5-cheng2.
閣來咧？若是拄著豬母較荏身，著愛共豬母的腹肚，疊較濟草咧。疊佮腹肚皮平懸，才袂拍種的時，予豬哥硩害去。這个工課仔若做無好勢，豬母會予豬哥硩un落去，牢種的機會就較減矣。設使若按呢敗種，後擺欲閣拍，價數就算對拗。

Koh lai5--leh? Na7 si7 tu2 tioh8 ti-bu2 khah lam2-sin, tioh8-ai3 ka7 ti-bu2 e5 pak-tou2, thiap8 khah che7 chhau2--leh. Thiap8 kap pak-tou2-phoe5 penn5 koan5, chiah be7 phah-cheng2 e5 si5, hou7 ti-ko teh hai7--khi3. Chit e5 khang-khoe3-a2 na7 cho3 bo5 ho2-se3, ti-bu2 e7 hou7 ti-ko teh un--loh8-khi3, tiau5-cheng2 e5 ki-hoe7to7 khahkiam2--a. Siat-su2 na7 an2-ne pai7-cheng2, au7-pai2 beh koh phah, ke3-siau3 to7 sng3 tui3-au2.
一隻豬哥，一工極加會使得拍四、五遍。佇豬哥當夯狂的時，咧創了袂對路，牽豬哥的著愛共抾路草，按呢才會當順序食百二。若是講一工相紲手欲「趕攤幾若斗」，牽豬哥的就會佇見擺「拍種」了後，會予豬哥幾粒仔生鴨卵去孝孤，來補充氣力，若無，豬哥較勇嘛無法得。

Chit8 chiah ti-ko, chit8 kang kek8-ke e7-sai2 tit phah si3, gou7 pian3. Ti7 ti-ko tng gia5-kong5 e5 si5, leh chhong3 liau2 be7 tui3-lou7, khan-ti-ko--e5 tioh8-ai3 ka7 khioh lou7-chhau2, an2-ne chiah e7-tang3 sun7-si7 chiah8 pah-ji7. na7 si7 kong2 chit8 kang sio-soa3-chhiu2 beh “koann2-thoann kui2-na7 tau2”,khan-ti-ko--e5 to7 e7 ti7 kian3-pai2 “phah-cheng2” liau2-au7, e7 hou7 ti-ko kui2 liap8-a2 chhenn-ah-nng7 khi3 hau3-kou, lai5 pou2-chhiong khui3-lat8, na7 bo5, ti-ko khah iong2 ma7 bo5-hoat--tit.
早前趁這途的，是用步輦的（行路的），後來才改用車載的，共豬哥關佇籠仔內，載去四界趁。到kah這當今，已經變成企業式的經營，飼豬的攏改用人工受胎，按呢一下反變，牽豬哥煞趁無食，姑不而將著愛轉途矣？

Cha2-cheng5 than3 chit-tou5--e5, si7 iong7 pou7-lian2--e5 (kiann5-lou7--e5), au7-lai5 chiah kai2 iong7 chhia chai3--e5, ka7 ti-ko koainn ti7 lang-a2 lai7, chai3 khi3 si3-ke3 than3. Kau3 kah chit tong-kim, i2-keng pinn3-chiann5 khi3-giap8-sek e5 keng-eng5, chhi7-ti--e5 long2 kai2 iong7 lang5-kang siu-the, an2-ne chit8-e7 peng2-pinn3, khan-ti-ko soah than3 bo5 chiah8, kou-put-ji7-chiong tioh8-ai3 choan2-tou5--a?
雖是講，飼豬這途的那來那進步！那綴時代咧行，啊毋閣若聽遐的老un5的咧提說牽豬哥的情景，閣不止心適，嘛真有鄉土味。佇in彼途的生活當中，嘛有留一寡上真、上實的話語，像講：「猴死，豬哥嘛無好過」，「倖豬夯灶，倖囝不孝」，「牽豬哥，提無錢，無彩潲」……遮的話看來粗俗，毋閣嘛有道理，嘛予咱足數念的，值得ka7寫落來，kam2毋是咧？

Sui si7 kong2, chhi7-ti chit-tou5--e5 na2 lai5 na2 chin3-pou7! Na2 toe3 si5-tai7 leh kiann5, ah m7-koh na7 thiann hiah-e5 lau7-un5--e5 leh the5-soeh khan-ti-ko e5 cheng5-keng2, koh put-chi2 sim-sek, ma7 chin u7 hiong-thou2-bi7. Ti7in hit-tou5 e5 seng-oah8 tang-tiong, ma7 u7 lau5 chit8-koa2 siong7 chin, siong7 sit8 e5 oe7-gi2, chhiunn7 kong2: “kau5 si2, ti-ko ma7 bo5 ho2-koe3”, “seng7 ti gia5 chau3, seng7 kiann2 put-hau3”, “khan-ti-ko, theh8 bo5 chinn5, bo5-chhai2 siau5”......Chiah-e5 oe7 khoann3--lai5 chhou-siok8, m7-koh ma7 u7 to7-li2, ma7 hou7 lan2 chiok siau3-liam7--e5, tat8-tit ka7 sia2--loh8-lai5, kam2m7 si7--leh?
